Uses of Interface
org.opengrok.indexer.authorization.IAuthorizationPlugin

  • Packages that use IAuthorizationPlugin 
    Package Description
    opengrok.auth.plugin  
    org.opengrok.indexer.authorization

    • Uses of IAuthorizationPlugin in opengrok.auth.plugin

      Classes in opengrok.auth.plugin that implement IAuthorizationPlugin 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractLdapPlugin
      Abstract class for all plug-ins working with LDAP.
      class  FalsePlugin
      Authorization plugin that returns false (not allowed) for all decisions.
      class  LdapAttrPlugin
      Authorization plug-in to check user's LDAP attribute against whitelist.
      class  LdapFilterPlugin
      Authorization plug-in to check if given user matches configured LDAP filter.
      class  LdapUserPlugin
      Authorization plug-in to extract user's LDAP attributes.
      class  TruePlugin
      Authorization plugin that returns true (allowed) for all decisions.
      class  UserPlugin
      Authorization plug-in to extract user info from HTTP headers.
      class  UserWhiteListPlugin
